biotools.summary: Compute mutation histories of somatic cells. Given noisy mutation profiles of single cells, this performs a stochastic search to find the Maximum Likelihood (ML) or Maximum aposterori (MAP) tree and/or to sample from the posterior probability distribution.

bioschemas.name: SCITE
bioschemas.summary: Compute mutation histories of somatic cells. Given noisy mutation profiles of single cells, this performs a stochastic search to find the Maximum Likelihood (ML) or Maximum aposterori (MAP) tree and/or to sample from the posterior probability distribution.
